fn.p: Edited by: Miroslav Obornik, Academy of Sciences of the Czech Republic (ASCR), Czechia
Reviewed by: Andrea Kučerová, Institute of Botany (ASCR), Czechia; Jianrong Ma, Chongqing Institute of Green and Intelligent Technology (CAS), China
This article was submitted to Marine and Freshwater Plants, a section of the journal Frontiers in Plant Science
